Instruction: Cook rice following the instructions on the package.

Place each tortilla on a plate and layer with rice, black beans, diced chicken breast, and shredded cheese. Optionally, add salsa. Fold the tortilla in half or roll it burrito-style and microwave for approximately 30 seconds for each individual burrito.
For convenience, a parent can store all ingredients in separate refrigerator containers, allowing their child to easily assemble a single burrito without assistance for an after-school snack.
